ITEM.name: Computing FLEX Segment Moduli
ITEM.text: is an example of implementing your own algorithm to compute FLEX segment Equivalent Young Modulus, Equivalent RatioToBend and Equivalent RatioToTwist.

ITEM.name: Testing Your Own Algorithm Implementation
ITEM.text: is an example of using CATIA to test your own algorithm implementation.

ITEM.name: Extending a Product as Harness Bundle
ITEM.text: is an example of how to extend a product as Harness Bundle.

ITEM.name: Navigating Components Inside an Electrical Branch Geometry
ITEM.text: is an example of how to navigate various components inside Electrical Branch Geometry (viz. Branch, Segment, Protective Coverings).

ITEM.name: Retrieving the Geometrical Definition of Components Inside Electrical Branch Geometry
ITEM.text: is an example of how to retrieve the geometrical definition of branch route, segment end points and protective covering end points.

ITEM.name: Managing Distant Links Between Harness Geometries
ITEM.text: is an example of how to manage distant links among branches/devices.

ITEM.name: Checking on Local Slack Values of a Branch
ITEM.text: is an example of how to check whether the local slack is applied, and how to check its values on branch portion.

ITEM.name: Accessing Attributes by Navigating through an Electrical Product's Tree
ITEM.text: This use case explains how to access to the attributes of an Electrical product, by navigating down from the product root to the base elements using element specific access methods.
